changeSet.sql: update dacuser set email_preference = true where dacUserId in (select user_id from user_role where email_preference = true)
update dacuser set status = 1 where dacUserId in (select user_id from user_role where status = 1)
update dacuser set status = 2 where dacUserId in (select user_id from user_role where status = 2)
update dacuser u set u.rationale = ( select r.rationale from user_role r where r.user_id = u.dacUserId and r.rationale is not null )
